name: Cakewalk ProChannel
detailed_description:
Note: Cakewalk ProChannel

Cakewalk ProChannel is included with SONAR Professional and Platinum only.

If you purchase any additional modules, make sure to first run the standalone Cakewalk ProChannel application in your STEAM Client, before attempting to use it in SONAR.


About the Software

Experience that big analog sound - and even create your own mixer architecture - with customizable channel strips in SONAR Professional and Platinum

ProChannel features a collection of audio processing modules that can be dynamically added, removed, and reordered per audio track, Instrument track and bus in the Inspector and Console view. Combining compression, equalization, and tube saturation modeling in one convenient processor, ProChannel is designed to make it fast and easy to enhance any track or bus.

SONAR Professional Includes:

  • QuadCurve EQ
  • REmatrix Solo
  • Softube Saturation Knob
  • Bark of the Dog
  • Panipulator
  • Tube Saturation

SONAR Platinum Includes:

  • QuadCurve EQ - with zoom spectrum analysis
  • PC4K S-Type Bus Compressor
  • PC76 U-Type Compressor
  • REmatrix Solo
  • Softube Saturation Knob
  • Bark of the Dog
  • Panipulator
  • Tube Saturation

short_description: Experience that big analog sound - and even create your own mixer architecture - with customizable channel strips in SONAR Professional and Platinum.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, or 10 (32- or 64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.6GHz Intel or AMD multi-core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x800 (1920 x 1080 recommended)
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ASIO compatible hardware is recommended
  • Additional Notes: Users must own SONAR Platinum, SONAR Professional, SONAR X3 Producer, or SONAR X3 Studio to utilize ProChannel Modules.

legal_notice: Users must own SONAR Platinum or SONAR Professional to utilize ProChannel Modules.
